item.title: Version 1.9.13
item.description:
NameQuick v1.9.13 Release Notes

Modern Interface Updates

  • Raycast-inspired toolbar with polished button styles for a more modern feel
  • Animated feedback buttons with smooth hover and click animations
  • Enhanced metadata panel with improved visual feedback and animations
  • Improved dropdown displays with better text rendering and consistent widths

Navigation & Responsiveness

  • Smoother app startup - fixed critical race conditions that could cause delays or crashes
  • Faster settings navigation - eliminated delays when switching between settings panels
  • Better button layouts - reordered action buttons for more intuitive interaction

üîß AI Service Enhancements

Gemini Service Improvements

  • Smart image compression - automatically optimizes large images for faster processing
  • File size validation - prevents processing of files that are too large for the AI service
  • Enhanced logging - better error reporting and debugging information

Processing Reliability

  • Improved watch folder logic - more reliable file detection and processing
  • Better error handling - clearer feedback when processing issues occur
  • Optimized resource usage - smarter memory management during batch operations

  • Enhanced help content for better user guidance across all settings

User Interface Polish

  • Consistent component styling across all settings panels
  • Improved field layouts for better organization and clarity
  • Enhanced validation feedback for all input fields

üêõ Bug Fixes

Critical Stability

  • Fixed startup modal race conditions that could cause app instability

This release focuses on making NameQuick more reliable, responsive, and user-friendly. The enhanced filename formatting system gives you better control over how your files are renamed, while the UI improvements make the app feel more polished and professional.
